targets.query: from(bucket:"telemetry") |> range(start: v.timeRange) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "hive_telemetry" and r._field == "t_in_c" and r.hive_id == "${hive}")
from(bucket:"telemetry") |> range(start: v.timeRange) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "hive_telemetry" and r._field == "audio_200_400" and r.hive_id == "${hive}")
from(bucket:"telemetry") |> range(start: v.timeRange) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "hive_telemetry" and (r._field == "co2_ppm" or r._field == "batt_v") and r.hive_id == "${hive}")
